name: QuestMaster AI
description: AI agent that curates and issues DeFi quests in the Mantle ecosystem. This agent is responsible for creating engaging quests for users to participate in DeFi activities such as swaps, providing liquidity, staking, and lending.

capabilities.name: QuestCreation
capabilities.description: Create DeFi quests with various categories (Swap, Liquidity, Stake, Lend)

capabilities.name: QuestCurating
capabilities.description: Select and curate engaging quests that align with market conditions

capabilities.name: DeFiProtocolIntegration
capabilities.description: Integration with DeFi protocols on Mantle such as Uniswap, Aave, etc.

capabilities.name: RewardManagement
capabilities.description: Manage distribution of klyra token rewards and NFT badges

about.name: Klyra DeFi Quest Platform
about.description: Gamification platform for DeFi activities in the Mantle ecosystem
